content:
This PR is split out from #16991 as suggested, only adding two lemma to prove a group is profinite is it is continuously isomorphic to a profinite group. This PR should be easy but two following PR #16992, #16993 all depend on this so I am asking for some review, thank you.
Also if we doesn't mind small overlaping of two different PR then maybe we can straightly go to the two mentioned above.
